title: (x) What font is this? / geometric sans - Neutra No. 2 {Ryuk, Riccardo}
content:
Anyone got any ideas on what this font is?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20110505073537/http:/typophile.com/files/font_191.jpg) | 4.65 KB |
author: thetallone

comments.content: [HTF Verlag (Bold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20110505073537/http:/typography.com/fonts/font_overview.php?productLineID=100009)? (or, part of the /M/, close to [HI Neutraface Display](http://web.archive.org/web/20110505073537/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/neutraface))

I was just looking at Neutraface too… not sure about the "R" though?

Can you provide any context, like where this sample is from – looks like a magazine possibly?

Hi

Unfortunately not it was a font someone used on genre covers, here's another example

[http://img412.imageshack.us/img412/1111/documentary.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20110505073537/http:/img412.imageshack.us/img412/1111/documentary.jpg "http://img412.imageshack.us/img412/1111/documentary.jpg")
